gdpr.title: Privacy and Cookie Notice
gdpr.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze performance. By continuing, you consent to our

features.title: AI-Powered Features
features.mainHeading: Everything you need for intelligent customer support
features.description: Powerful AI-driven chatbot tools to engage visitors, answer questions, and convert leads 24/7. Transform your customer experience with intelligent automation.

management.title: Conversation Management
management.description: Monitor and manage all customer conversations from one intuitive dashboard. Track AI performance and human handoffs effortlessly.

types.title: AI & Human Hybrid
types.description: Seamlessly blend AI automation with human expertise. Let AI handle common queries while humans manage complex issues.

targeting.title: Smart Personalization
targeting.description: AI adapts responses based on visitor behavior, location, and context. Deliver personalized experiences at scale.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced AI Capabilities
advancedFeatures.mainHeading: Intelligent chatbot tools for superior customer experience
advancedFeatures.description: Leverage cutting-edge AI technology to deliver personalized, efficient customer support that scales with your business

builder.title: AI Training Studio
builder.description: Customize your AI chatbot's knowledge base and personality with intuitive training tools

analytics.title: Conversation Analytics
analytics.description: Gain deep insights into customer interactions, satisfaction rates, and AI performance metrics

timing.title: 24/7 Availability
timing.description: Never miss a customer inquiry with round-the-clock AI-powered support coverage

integrations.title: Seamless Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with CRM, helpdesk, and business tools for unified customer experiences

testimonials.title: Customer Success
testimonials.description: See how companies are revolutionizing their customer support with our AI-powered chatbot solution

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.quote: Our AI chatbot handles 80% of customer inquiries automatically. Response times dropped from hours to seconds, and customer satisfaction is at an all-time high.

items.name: Alex Rivera
items.quote: The seamless handoff between AI and human agents is incredible. Our team can focus on complex issues while the AI handles routine questions perfectly.

items.name: David Chen
items.quote: 24/7 customer support without the overhead. The AI learns from every interaction and gets smarter every day. It's like having a super-powered support team.

items.description: Customer conversations handled monthly by our AI chatbots
Businesses trust our AI chatbot platform
Reduction in customer support response time

cta.heading: Ready to revolutionize your customer support?
cta.description: Join thousands of forward-thinking businesses using our AI-powered chatbot platform to deliver exceptional customer experiences

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.heading: Choose your perfect plan
pricing.description: Simple, transparent pricing that grows with you. Try any plan free for 30 days.
pricing.noPlans: No subscription plans available at the moment.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.heading: Stay ahead with AI customer support insights
newsletter.description: Get the latest trends in AI chatbots, customer experience optimization, and automation strategies delivered to your inbox.
newsletter.success: Thank you for subscribing! You will receive our next newsletter.
newsletter.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

hero.description: Transform your customer experience with intelligent chatbots that provide instant, personalized support 24/7. Reduce response times and boost satisfaction.

integration.description: Follow these steps to integrate popups into your website
